field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
float array of 3 items in [0, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Gizmo group this gizmo is a member of
Scale the offset matrix (use to apply screen-space offset)
Use scale when calculating the matrix
Show an indicator for the current value while dragging
Don’t write into the depth buffer

field_body.paragraph: location (int array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (never None)) – Location, Region coordinates

list_item.paragraph: RUNNING_MODAL Running Modal, Keep the operator running with blender.
CANCELLED Cancelled, When no action has been taken, operator exits.
FINISHED Finished, When the operator is complete, operator exits.
PASS_THROUGH Pass Through, Do nothing and pass the event on.
INTERFACE Interface, Handled but not executed (popup menus).
RUNNING_MODAL Running Modal, Keep the operator running with blender.
CANCELLED Cancelled, When no action has been taken, operator exits.
FINISHED Finished, When the operator is complete, operator exits.
PASS_THROUGH Pass Through, Do nothing and pass the event on.
INTERFACE Interface, Handled but not executed (popup menus).
matrix (float multi-dimensional array of 4 * 4 items in [-inf, inf]) – The matrix to transform
select_id (int in [-1, inf], (optional)) – Zero when not selecting
matrix (float multi-dimensional array of 4 * 4 items in [-inf, inf]) – The matrix to transform
axis (enum in ['POS_X', 'POS_Y', 'POS_Z', 'NEG_X', 'NEG_Y', 'NEG_Z'], (optional)) – Arrow Orientation
select_id (int in [-1, inf], (optional)) – Zero when not selecting
matrix (float multi-dimensional array of 4 * 4 items in [-inf, inf]) – The matrix to transform
axis (enum in ['POS_X', 'POS_Y', 'POS_Z', 'NEG_X', 'NEG_Y', 'NEG_Z'], (optional)) – Arrow Orientation
select_id (int in [-1, inf], (optional)) – Zero when not selecting

desc_content.paragraph: Draw the face-map of a mesh object

list_item.paragraph: object (Object, (never None)) – Object
facemap (int in [0, inf], (optional)) – Face map index
select_id (int in [-1, inf], (optional)) – Zero when not selecting
target (string, (never None)) – Target property
data (AnyType, (never None)) – Data from which to take property
property (string, (never None)) – Identifier of property in data

desc_content.paragraph: Operator to run when activating the gizmo (overrides property targets)

list_item.paragraph: operator (string, (never None)) – Target operator
index (int in [0, 255], (optional)) – Part index

desc_content.paragraph: Draw a shape created form bpy.types.Gizmo.draw_custom_shape.

list_item.paragraph: shape (Undefined.) – The cached shape to draw.
matrix (mathutils.Matrix) – 4x4 matrix, when not given bpy.types.Gizmo.matrix_world is used.
select_id – The selection id. Only use when drawing within bpy.types.Gizmo.draw_select.

desc_content.paragraph: Create a new shape that can be passed to bpy.types.Gizmo.draw_custom_shape.

list_item.paragraph: type (string) – The type of shape to create in (POINTS, LINES, TRIS, LINE_STRIP).
verts (sequence of of 2D or 3D coordinates.) – Coordinates.
display_name (Callable that takes a string and returns a string.) – Optional callback that takes the full path, returns the name to display.

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.

desc_content.paragraph: Get the range for this target property.

field_body.paragraph: The range of this property (min, max).

desc_content.paragraph: Get the value of this target property.

field_body.paragraph: The value of the target property.
Single value or array based on the target type

desc_content.paragraph: Assigns callbacks to a gizmos property.

list_item.paragraph: get (callable) – Function that returns the value for this property (single value or sequence).
set (callable) – Function that takes a single value argument and applies it.
range (callable) – Function that returns a (min, max) tuple for gizmos that use a range.

desc_content.paragraph: Set the value of this target property.
